lines.text: You know I hadn't noticed you were so fascinating before. Maybe it's the new gown.
My opinion is that it shouldn't take any longer to get divorced than it does to get married.
A man can't love a woman and do what you've done. How can he?
Mr. Wyatt, it is very evident you do not understand women. When a woman says no, she usually means yes.
I almost forgot. We have to get a couple of nifties.
No, no, no. Nifties. Sweet Mamas.
Is she a friend of yours?
No, but she will be in a moment.
